select * FROM (select * FROM (select D.OrderNo, D.DetailNo, D.ColorCode, D.Color, D.SizeCode, D.Size, D.PatternDimensionCode, D.SampleCode, P.ItemBrand, D.ItemCode, D.Item, D.SKUCode, D.SKUCodeForShipping, D.OrderQty_Pcs, P.BusinessUnit FROM T_ORDER_DETAIL D INNER JOIN T_PO_INFO P on P.OrderNo=D.OrderNo AND (P.IsDel is null OR P.IsDel = 0) AND (D.IsDel is null OR D.IsDel = 0) ORDER BY datediff(P.ContractedETD,NOW()) ASC,D.DetailNo DESC limit 1) a UNION ALL select * FROM (select D.OrderNo, D.DetailNo, D.ColorCode, D.Color, D.SizeCode, D.Size, D.PatternDimensionCode, D.SampleCode, P.ItemBrand, D.ItemCode, D.Item, D.SKUCode, D.SKUCodeForShipping, D.OrderQty_Pcs, P.BusinessUnit FROM T_ORDER_DETAIL D INNER JOIN T_PO_INFO P on P.OrderNo=D.OrderNo AND (P.IsDel is null OR P.IsDel = 0) AND (D.IsDel is null OR D.IsDel = 0)
ORDER BY datediff(NOW(),P.ContractedETD) ASC,D.DetailNo DESC limit 1) b) c limit 1

select D.OrderNo, D.DetailNo, D.ColorCode, D.Color, D.SizeCode, D.Size, D.PatternDimensionCode, D.SampleCode, P.ItemBrand, D.ItemCode, D.Item, D.SKUCode, D.SKUCodeForShipping, D.OrderQty_Pcs, P.BusinessUnit, (SELECT SUM(C.ScanNum) FROM T_Metalcheck C WHERE C.SkuCode= D.SkuCode AND C.OrderNo=D.OrderNo) ScanNum FROM T_ORDER_DETAIL D INNER JOIN T_PO_INFO P on P.OrderNo=D.OrderNo AND (P.IsDel is null OR P.IsDel = 0) AND (D.IsDel is null OR D.IsDel = 0)
order by P.ContractedETD DESC

select P.OrderNo, P.SampleCode, D.DetailNo, D.OrderQty_Pcs, P.BusinessUnit, P.ItemBrand, CONCAT(D.ColorCode,':',D.Color) Color, CONCAT(D.SizeCode,':',D.Size) Size, DATE_FORMAT(P.ContractedETD,"%Y-%m-%d") etd, ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(M.ScanNum),0) FROM T_Metalcheck M WHERE M.OrderNo = D.OrderNo AND M.SKUCode = D.SKUCode ) AS ScanNum FROM T_ORDER_DETAIL D INNER JOIN T_PO_INFO P on P.OrderNo=D.OrderNo AND (P.IsDel is null OR P.IsDel = 0) AND (D.IsDel is null OR D.IsDel = 0)
order by P.ContractedETD DESC
